topics.body:
So recently I was wadding through the DSi Ware section of the Eshop since Nintendo has slowly been importing the old library to the modern interface, and I came across this little diary application. It offers you cute backdrops for your journal entries, "stickers" to paste onto your workpage, and "magic spells" that make certain things happen if you click on a word set. So naturally, something for the kiddies. But something about it interested me so much that I ended up actually buying it, and since then, I've been writing nonstop for the first time since I was a kid. This shitty fourth grade-level app actually rekindled a flame within my soul.

How about that.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
